name: wavebox-browser-control-mcp
description: Control Wavebox browser tabs, windows, and navigation
long_description:
This extension allows Claude to interact with Wavebox, enabling tab management, navigation, page content reading, and browser automation. It uses Wavebox's AppleScript API to control the browser programmatically.

This extension is experimental
author: Thomas Beverley <tom@wavebox.io>

tools.name: get_current_tab
tools.description: Get information about the current active tab

tools.name: list_tabs
tools.description: List all open tabs in Wavebox

tools.name: execute_javascript
tools.description: Execute JavaScript in the current tab

tools.name: get_page_content
tools.description: Get the text content of the current page
